Description: Upper body sherd of large Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centre and, to its right, part of white and red pomegranate; exterior, from top (rim lost): band of dots between pairs of dilute lines painted decoration consisting of sphinx (part of head, hair, curlicue and trace of wing remaining) to right; group of short vertical dashes as fillling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0558) (phase 2)
